backend.storage.file

Class LiveFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend.storage.file.CaseFile
      • backend.storage.file.LiveFile

  • public class LiveFile
extends CaseFile
    Subclass of CaseFile, used to represent an evidence file stored in the live directory. By default this directory is located at /cases/live/.
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Jacob Jones, Andrew Rottier

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  LiveFile.DeleteFileResult
      Values representing the possible results of calling deleteFile.
      static class  LiveFile.SaveFileResult
      Values representing the possible results of calling saveFile.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean saved 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LiveFile(Case parentCase, java.lang.String filePath)
      Calls the constructor for CaseFile using the passed in values, initializes and populates instance fields.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LiveFile.DeleteFileResult deleteFile()
      Deletes this file from its location in /cases/live/.
      Img getImg()
      Returns an Img object containing the image currently stored within this file.
      boolean getSaved()
      Returns a boolean value indicating whether or not this file has been saved since it was last modified.
      LiveFile.SaveFileResult saveFile(Img img)
      Saves this file by overwriting the version stored in /cases/live/ and adding to the versions stored in /cases/backup/.
      void setSaved(boolean saved)
      Sets the value within the saved instance field.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LiveFile

        public LiveFile(Case parentCase,
        java.lang.String filePath)
         throws InvalidFileException
        Calls the constructor for CaseFile using the passed in values, initializes and populates instance fields.
        Parameters:
        parentCase - the instance of Case that this file is attached to
        filePath - String value containing the full file path associated with this file
        Throws:
        InvalidFileException - if there is an error in reading this file into memory

    • Method Detail

      • getImg

        public Img getImg()
           throws InvalidFileException
        Returns an Img object containing the image currently stored within this file.
        Returns:
        Img object containing the image currently stored within this file
        Throws:
        InvalidFileException - if there is an error reading the image into memory

      • getSaved

        public boolean getSaved()
        Returns a boolean value indicating whether or not this file has been saved since it was last modified.
        Returns:
        true if this file has been saved since it was last modified, false if otherwise

      • setSaved

        public void setSaved(boolean saved)
        Sets the value within the saved instance field.
        Parameters:
        saved - the boolean value to set saved to

      • deleteFile

        public LiveFile.DeleteFileResult deleteFile()
        Deletes this file from its location in /cases/live/. Retains all previously saved versions stored in /cases/backup/.
        Returns:
        DeleteFileResult enum type indicating whether or not the delete operation was successful

      • saveFile

        public LiveFile.SaveFileResult saveFile(Img img)
        Saves this file by overwriting the version stored in /cases/live/ and adding to the versions stored in /cases/backup/.
        Parameters:
        img - Img object containing the image that will be saved within this file
        Returns:
        SaveFileResult enum type indicating whether or not the save operation was successful
